sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_posts (post_no, post_board_no, post_title, post_writer_no, post_content) values (comm_posts_seq.nextval, #board.boardNo#, #title#, #employee.empNo#, #content#)
sqlMap.update: update comm_posts set post_title = #title#, post_content = #content#, post_important = #important#, post_read_count = #readCount#, post_suggestion_count = #suggestionCount#, post_comment_count = #commentCount#, post_deleted = #deleted#, post_updated_date = sysdate, post_deleted_date = sysdate where post_no = #postNo#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from comm_posts where post_deleted = 'N'
and post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and post_writer_no in (select emp_no from comm_employees where emp_name = #keyword#)
and post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'

select A.post_no as postNo, A.post_board_no as "board.boardNo", A.post_title as title, A.post_writer_no as "employee.empNo", B.emp_name as "employee.name", A.post_created_date as createdDate from (select
row_number() over (order by post_no desc) row_numbers, post_no, post_board_no, post_title, post_writer_no, post_content, post_important, post_read_count, post_suggestion_count, post_comment_count, post_deleted, post_created_date, post_updated_date, post_deleted_date from comm_posts where post_deleted = 'N'
and post_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and post_writer_no in (select emp_no from comm_employees where emp_name = #keyword#)
and post_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
) A, comm_employees B, comm_boards C where A.row_numbers between #begin# and #end# and A.post_writer_no = B.emp_no and A.post_board_no = c.board_no order by A.post_no desc

select A.post_no as postNo, A.post_board_no as "board.boardNo", A.post_title as title, A.post_writer_no as "employee.empNo", B.emp_name as "employee.name", C.department_name as "department.name", A.post_content as content, A.post_important as important, A.post_read_count as readCount, A.post_suggestion_count as suggestionCount, A.post_comment_count as commentCount, A.post_deleted as deleted, A.post_created_date as createdDate, A.post_updated_date as updatedDate, A.post_deleted_date as deletedDate
from comm_posts A, comm_employees B, comm_departments C where A.post_writer_no = B.emp_no and B.emp_position_no = C.department_no and post_no = #value#
